content: Another amazing session with Mark. super quick with excellent communication in understanding the issue and offering multi solutions. Couldn't be happier with the service.
Amazing debugger, and great at explaining how we got to root of the problem and proposing different solutions.
very helpful and a great explainer
Very knowledgeable and quick to troubleshoot when running into roadblocks.
Very helpful. He explained AJAX in a helpful way.
Mark knocked it out of the park for us filling in for a lo.st developer

Ive known about Mark for a while through his React courses, I reached out to him to help me start architecting an app I am building as a side project. He was awesome! I got answers to alot of the areas of this project that I was unfamiliar with and we planned out a way to get the project going. Really looking forward to continuing to work with him.
Mark completed a project for us within a short amount of time. His code was excellent and he always confirmed we understood his work for the handoff.
Mark worked on freelance projects for us. He was flexible and communicated well. His coding was excellent and he made sure we understood what he was doing.
Mark has been an excellent mentor. He asks clear questions, checks that we understand what he doing, and is prompt with his sessions. Highly recommend him.
Mark is an excellent communicator, and he provides the info and the value you want in a mentor.
So great working with Mark! He's very talented and highly skilled.
Another awesome session!! Mark is great explaining everything in a very easy to understand way, thanks!!
Another awesome session! Thank you!
Best session and mentor!! Mark identifies very quickly the best solution and the best logic and makes sure to explains in detail everything, thank you!!
Mark is great, very helpful and knowledgeable. We looked at React and Javascript problems which Mark was able to solve.

Mark has a wealth of knowledge and expertise that is hard to find. Perfect mentor in many ways: clear and concise communication, reliable and a great teacher. I highly recommend working with him if you need help.
Great teacher, helped me so much with my  [horror] rails project!
Amazing developer, would have been dead in the water without Mark!

Wow, Mark has really proved himself to be an expert in many ways. Definitely worth the investment and here's why:
Pros: He works really fast, gave me some really helpful tips, explained me everything through meaningful examples and even improved some parts of already existing code in a way which makes them more clean and usable.
Cons: I only wish the session was longer as I am looking forward to another one :)
Excellent, Really helped me and have given me new information.  If you want to become a professional in React or regular JavaScript, then look no further...

I’ve used Mark a couple times. He is awesome!  I’ve been using Rails, etc for 7+ years but I still get hung up once in a while...Mark knows his $h!.  I won’t search for mentors anymore...I’ll just use Mark.
Has a clear road map for teaching long-term mentees.
just a start awesome
Javascript super star!!!

Mark really knows his code. TDIL why implementing certain react features is preferred,  and how certain design decisions are more performant. Mark is an interesting coder and skilled at teaching. I recommend him to anyone.
excellent work, great communicator, sharp, very clear.
Worked on redis improvements.
Great as always!
I really enjoy working with Mark, and he has a lot of knowledge. Recommend!
awesome dude and great mentor.
Excellent communication and knowledge!
A lot to learn from this guy, and he has great communication. Totally recommend.
Excellent communication, ethic and knowledge. Thank you.
Awesome, as always.
I've been working with Mark for the past 6 months
I liked the explanations of ReactJS code and the tip of providing a video of how to deploy to GitHub pages.

I usually have more conceptual questions on Codementor and Mark came in with a good idea of what it was that I was very confused about and was quick to direct me to the concepts that I was missing.

We discussed ActiveRecord (pattern, not gem).
What to pass in a RESTful API to reduce cognitive load
When to use objects and when to use serialized IDs as function parameters.
Great session with Mark trying to figure out how to improve our Google page speed score through optimizing the webpack javascript bundles.
Worked on writing a tmp file and saving it to the database on S3.
Just had my first session with Mark and it was great! Superb knowledge of react.js and rails, and how the two can work together. Really enjoyed it - highly recommended!
I'll be brief. Mark is awesome! I'm working with him on a project consistently.
Great to work with. Saved to my list of must go to's for node.js development.
You can learn TONS from this guy. He knows how to get things done and solve complicated problems!
AMAZING!!!!!! this guy runs through problems no problem. Rails and React, this guy is your man
Great knowledge, highly recommend Mark !
Mark was very quick and helpful and he definitely  knows his science, language and frameworks.  I highly recommend him.  Value > price, all day. Tellez FTW

Mark has been helping us daily with our website for about a week now and I would confidently recommend him to any peer looking for someone who is a fast developer, strong communicator and honest worker.
Worked on saving canvas image to the database as base64
Mark continues to do awesome job!!

Really great! Mark walked me through a tricky issue I was basing off of legacy code, and came up with a much more intuitive workaround I can jump off from. Both of the issues I posted for help about were solved, and I came away with a decent toolkit to deal with some performance issues in both my code and my computer.
Solved the issue
He is the best, we are gonna work on long term tasks
Mark is great.  He is very fast at diagnosing issues.  Would recommend highly.
Mark came through for me. He knew how to target my problem and rethink it so that I could attack it from a much easier angle. Excellent mentor.
Best help with ruby that I've found.
Great job as usual!
Working on a challenging feature. As usual, awesome job!
Helped me with a minor bug using actioncables and also helped me understand performance better.
Probably did 5+ sessions with Mark so far and it's been great every time!

Mark is so good at JavaScript and React (and Redux). He immediately knows how to address the task at hand and then starts throwing down code. I really appreciate his positive attitude and the time he takes to walk me through the work.
He was amazing and really helped me think through the problem.

Mark was very helpful in debugging a React/Redux issue. He quickly isolated an issue and that helped uncover some other problems that needed attention. He also helped after the session by providing links and references to other skilled devs.
My First session with Mark as a complete novice when it comes to developing.  But I am confident that we can work on my education and project together for a long time to come.
Mark was helpful as usual! He did a great job explaining concepts and making them easy to understand.
Simply awesome!
awesome per usual.
Great Mentor. Helped me to implement the feature.
Mark is a Rails / React / Programming ninja who goes above & beyond in every session. Totally recommend him to help with whatever you're stuck on!
Mark was very helpful! He was knowledgeable and easily demonstrated the way to solve my problem.

Mark has helped me several times at this point and is always quick and knowledgeable and writes great code (despite my usual, annoying lack of A/V for our sessions). He's worth the higher price because you know he knows what he's doing! Thanks as always, Mark!
Mark guided me to turn a complex feature into simple solution.
Mark has done it again! I will continue to use services in the future
Fixed sidekiq and discussed on how to open source my software and let others build stuff on top of mine.
Mark is an amazing mentor! He helped me create a solution that didn't over complicate my feature.
Absolutely unbelievable teacher. This will DEFINITELY not be the last time that I speak with Mark.
Another awesome session!! Mark explains the logic very clearly and I can understand it very well. Thanks!!
Another great session with mark!
Awesome mentor! He explains all of this steps and make sure he understands what you are trying to do.
Best mentor I have hired so far, went straight to point, solve my issue and explain what was going on, brilliant!
Very helpful session! I learned how to build complex logic very quickly, thanks Mark!
Another awesome session!! Mark is the best Rails and Javascript mentor! Explains everything in a very detailed way and makes sure I understand it and know the logic.
Fantastic as always. Found the problem and helped me think more like a developer. Mark is quickly becoming my go-to guy.
Mark helped me greatly, and was friendly to talk with.

Mark is great. Not only did he solve the problem I had, but before the session began I was having trouble with my screen sharing -- and he actually paused the session and discovered the problem with my computer. Once we fixed my computer, then we started the session and he solved my problem quickly.

Moreover, he's a fun guy and I would enjoy his company regardless.
Mark is the man.
Great session!! Mark is a great mentor and very knowledgeable. I learned how to structure the code in a better way and now I understand it much better.
Great session!! Very knowledgeable Ruby, Rails and React JS mentor. He helps you understand the different elements in the code in a very clear and easy way. Thanks!!!
Mark is an excellent mentor.
Knowledgeable, many insights and just all around beneficial information. We'll meet again Mark. We shall meet again!
Extremely helpful and informative, not only in fixing my code but explaining some higher level concepts in detail.  Thank you!
Mark is helping me with a side project that involves working with javascript in embeds. I'm learning a lot and he is an awesome instructor.
Very helpful. Above and beyond what I was expecting.
Finished building shopify theme builder clone. Great session as always!
Worked on building a shopify theme builder clone.

Mark understands everything very quickly and tries to make things as easy as possible for me to understand. Also answers questions effectively. 

Helped me understand how shopify web builder works and started building it using rails.
Mark is awesome! very helpful and knowledgable.
I learned so much! He makes programming seem easy!
I am so glad I did this....wow....
Very helpful!
Had another session with mark explaining how to clean up my controllers and models. A++++++
Great mentor will use again. Very patient and understanding.
Mark is very knowledgeable and explains concepts in a simplistic way

We're building a codementor timer using react + rails + actioncables!
Honest and fair and excellent coder.
Awesome First session. Learnt much more than i was anticipating. Very knowledgable about the topic, And very thorough
Great
Fantastic mentor.
Great job

Mark is a great mentor! He's super knowledgable and as a student I appreciate his ability to explain concepts clearly. I can tell he really cares about my learning and progress. He is fair and makes sure I'm getting value from our sessions. Highly recommended!
Great Rails and React session! Great explanation also of all the logic in a very clear way!!
Great Rails and React session! Very knowledgeable and a great mentor!! I understand everything and we go over all the items in a very clear way. Thank you!!
Great session as always! Great mentor and very knowledgeable! Thank you!!
Mark quickly constructed a robust solution for a javascript project after I explained what I needed.
Another great session with Mark! Awesome Ruby on Rails mentor!! Thank you!!
Awesome!! Mark is a very talented developer and a great teacher! He identifies the way to build it, the right way, and makes sure to explain it in detail. Thanks!
Very knowledgeable and really expert will be my future mentor.
Mark helped me get set up to send emails from the Rails console, which is exactly what I wanted, and what's more we got it done in just a couple of minutes.  No hassle, straight to the point.

Mark is very knowledgable mentor and he knows how to solve any kind of technical problem. he is very passionate about React and Rails. If you want to have deep understanding of React and Rails Mark is the mentor for you!!!
Mark was a great help in getting my app to function properly.
Awesome in helping out and explaining concepts along with best practices.
Mark took the time to understand what I needed help with and we got right to it. He gave helpful hints along the way while accomplishing what I need to get done in a timely matter.
On time and very helpful.  Will definitely use Mark's services again.
Mark helped me solve a touch gesture issue that had been lingering for months! THANKS MARK
Mark was very helpful and had a lot of extra advice that gave me a better perspective of looking at coding.
Great session, really quickly got down to business and help me out.
Excellent mentor, helped me out a lot.
Awesome Mentor super friendly amazing debugger can help you solve any problem at fast paced and will make sure you learn as well. Highly recommended!!!
Perfect mentor. He was very committed to solve my issue.
Awesome guy! Very professional work! I would strongly recommend Mark!

Helpful quick sanity check on the topic at hand. Thanks!
Pretty good first session!

Great Session with mark debugging HTML and CSS problems and implementing into Rails application

Super helpful session with mark have taught me a lot building social networking website with rails. He has a lot of knowledge and passionate about teaching!!!

Mark is great!  He is patient, knowledgable, and very helpful.  I will definitely use him again.
Mark is a great teacher takes his time explaining in details and work very efficiently

I recommend him 100%.
